name: Ethan Carter
profile: Proficient Back-End Engineer specializing in building scalable microservices and robust RESTful APIs.
education: B.S. in Computer Science, University of California, Berkeley, 2018 (GPA: 3.8/4.0)

description: Developed and deployed microservices using Python and Flask, supporting over 1 million monthly active users.

Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker, accelerating release cycles by 30%.
Designed RESTful APIs for internal tools, improving operational efficiency for multiple departments.
Developed logging mechanisms using Elasticsearch and Kibana to monitor application health in real-time.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform Backend
description: Built a robust order management system using Django and PostgreSQL, enabling seamless processing of transactions.
Integrated third-party payment gateways like Stripe and PayPal for secure and efficient payment handling.
Implemented caching strategies with Redis to improve API response times.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: Developed a scalable WebSocket server using Flask and Redis, enabling real-time messaging for thousands of users.
Implemented message queueing with RabbitMQ to ensure reliability under high load conditions.
